quote_first: Father expected his shaving-water to be ready at a
quote_last: . Just seven minutes late, Dorothy took the can upstairs and knocked at her father's door.
title: A Clergyman's Daughter
author: George Orwell

quote_last: Just starting to get light. A small knot of older teenagers were leaning against a nearby wall. They looked as though they had been out all night.Two of the guys stared at us. Their eyes hard and threatening.
title: Girl Missing
author: Sophie McKenzie
